name: SandBums Holiday Open House
description: Stop by just for a holiday nectar. Chat with your hosts and win prizes galore! Lotta money could be in your pockets just in time for the holiday rush! Not to mention a Mystic Tree, Pink Limo and a few other surprises. WE look forward to seeing you there :) Ho Ho HO!

name: Guardian Casino GRAND OPENING
description: Opening in this server the Guardian Casino is going live .Will be having games include Dice poker, paint poker, slot races, spin the bottle, dare to wake Grim, and hat giveaways every 15 mins all thru the night and day :)
